MD.analysis.center_mass

Package MD.analysis.center_mass

This module is used to find the center of mass of particles. More...

Functions

def CM
 Finds the CM of a cluster of particles given.

Detailed Description

This module is used to find the center of mass of particles.

A good use of this is to create major particles from polymers in order to better make use of the anlysis tools in this package

Note this method has not been fully implemented

Function Documentation

  cluster,
  L 
)

Finds the CM of a cluster of particles given.

np.array containing xyz of cm for each cluster
Parameters:
